title: Supreme Court to Consider Biden Appeal to End ‘Remain in Mexico’ Policy
sub_head: Lower courts have blocked the administration’s effort to end the Trump-era immigration program
body:
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court said Friday it would consider whether the Biden administration has the power to end a Trump-era program that denies asylum applicants from Central America entry to the U.S. while their cases are pending.
Lower courts have blocked the administration from ending the Migrant Protection Protocols, often called the “Remain in Mexico” policy, finding that the Department of Homeland Security didn’t follow required procedures to end the program.
